interface.name: aml_config
interface.description: Weston extension to inform the clients of the new interface added by amlogic.

request.name: destroy
request.description: Destroys the factory object, but does not affect any other objects.

event.name: aml_config_list
event.description: The aml_config_list event inform the clients of the new interface add by amlogic

arg.name: list
arg.summary: the new interface added by amlogic
